name: Planet 3D
description:
A game where you fight aliens and build houses to create a colony on a small planet.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

In Planet 3D, you play as a human stranded on an alien planet. Your goal is to collect trash and recycle it to build houses and other things. However, the inhabitants of the planet are trying to stop you, so you will have to defend yourself. The more you build, the more aliens will spawn.

_______________________________________________________________________________________

Planet3D was developed by 3 developers during a Gamejam.

  • Manager/Programmer | Paul Neuhold
  • 3D Artist/Second Programmer | Maximilian Silwester
  • 2D Artist | Anika Kremecek
